title: MEIOU & Taxes 1.15 (For Europa Universalis IV 1.6.1)
description:
Name: MEIOU & Taxes
Web: http://wiki.meiouandtaxes.com
Version: 1.15 (Supports EUIV 1.6 + 1.6.1)

Install:
1. Extract M&T v1.15.7z
2. Move contents to C:UsersnameMy DocumentsParadox InteractiveEuropa Universalis IVmod
3. Run game and enable the mod by clicking on it in the launcher
4. Support the game!

Description:
Welcome to MEIOU and Taxes, an EUIV total conversion mod brought about by the merger of the EUIII mods, Death and Taxes and MEIOU, and brought to you by Lukew, Gigau, DHarper, Sun Wu and the M&T team. This mod contains 970 new provinces and 450 new nations. Almost every aspect of the game has been either reworked or completely redone, with a new map, new trade system, new musical score, redone graphics and a totally reworked religious system. If you have any ideas or comments, please let us know at meiouandtaxes.com, if you want help with anything, please visit wiki.meiouandtaxes.com. You can also find us on Facebook at

Details:

  - 970 New Provinces
  - 450 New Nations
  - Overhauled religious system
  - Specially composed music
  - Completely reworked trade map
  - Improved map graphics
  - New national landmarks
